document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc 
Subject: RE: presentment of Jeffrey Epstein 
Date: Mon, 08 Jul 2019 03:11:30 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Good evening, 
We will formally call this in tomorrow morning, but we wanted to advise you that we expect that defendant Jeffrey 
Epstein will be presented tomorrow in United States v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490. We expect the indictment to be unsealed first 
thing tomorrow morning, and we'll et ou a co immediately when that occurs. Mr. Epstein is represented by retained 
counsel, including Martin Weinberg nd Reid Weingarten. 
We are available anytime tomorrow to provide any useful information in connection with your report, either at the email 
addresses here or via phone at the following numbers: 
thank you, 
EFTA00026635
